mapper.select: select * from t_forum_post_information where owned_section = #{gameSectionName} and is_deleted = '00' and is_sensitive = '10'
mapper.insert: insert into t_forum_post_information(post_id, owned_section, post_subject, post_content, post_author, view_count, comment_count, is_deleted, is_sensitive, create_time, update_time) values (#{postId}, #{ownedSection}, #{postSubject}, #{postContent}, #{postAuthor}, #{viewCount}, #{commentCount}, #{deleted}, #{sensitive}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_forum_post_comment(comment_id, post_id, comment_author, comment_content, create_time, update_time) values (#{commentId}, #{postId}, #{commentAuthor}, #{commentContent}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_forum_post_comment(comment_id, post_id, comment_reply_id, comment_author, comment_content, create_time, update_time) values (#{commentId}, #{postId}, #{commentReplyId}, #{commentAuthor}, #{commentContent}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
